datafield.subfield: Ordnance Survey of the Peninsula of Sinai.
2 vols. (of 5) : Text - [4], 324 p., 12 col. pl., 8 monochrome pl. Maps - 10 folded maps

The ordnance survey of the Sinai peninsula consists of one volume of text [44], with a separate album of 10 folded maps [45]. The text volume includes 20 (12 col., 8 monochrome) numbered lithographed plates of views, antiquities, diagrams, and zoological and geological specimens. Several plates depict details from the monastery of St. Katharine. The survey was originally published in 5 volumes, with 3 volumes of more than 150 mounted photographs, which the library does not hold.

Ordnance Survey of Mount Serbal : Hill Shaded (45-09-770), Ordnance Survey of Mount Serbal : Outline (45-08-768), Ordnance Survey of Mount Serbal : Sections (45-10-769), Ordnance Survey of Mount Sinai : Hill Shaded (45-06-765), Ordnance Survey of Mount Sinai : Outline (45-05-767), Ordnance Survey of Mount Sinai : Sections at Mt. Sinai (45-07-766), Ordnance Survey of the Peninsula of Sinai : Peninsula of Sinai (45-01-763), Ordnance Survey of the Peninsula of Sinai : Peninsula of Sinai Geologically Colored (45-02-761), Ordnance Survey of the Peninsula of Sinai : Peninsula of Sinai Sheet 1: Outline (45-03-762), Ordnance Survey of the Peninsula of Sinai : Peninsula of Sinai Sheet 1:Hill Shaded (45-04-764).
